metadata.title: CVE-2022-42890 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in Batik of Apache XML Graphics allows an attacker to runJava code from untrusted SVG via JavaScript. This issue affects Apache XMLGraphics prior to 1.16. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.16.

criterions.comment: batik: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
